metadata.title: USN-4400-1 -- nfs-utils vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that the nfs-utils package set incorrect permissions on the /var/lib/nfs directory. An attacker could possibly use this issue to escalate privileges.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4400-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  nfs-kernel-server - 1:1.2.8-9ubuntu12.3 nfs-common - 1:1.2.8-9ubuntu12.3 No subscription required
